summary: Consumer validation and acceptance of Toyfoundry telemetry exports.

directives.details: Obtain sample export referenced by Order 010 report (or coordinate with Toyfoundry for access) and perform ingestion into the consumer pipeline. Produce an ingestion_log with record counts and any parse errors.
Confirm schema version matches Toyfoundry's export_schema.md. Validate field names, types, nullability, and allowed values. Identify any mismatches or unexpected fields.
If ingestion passes, provide acceptance sign-off with the confirmed schema version and any constraints. If issues exist, provide a concise list of blockers with severity and recommended changes.

Submit acknowledgement and a factory report summarizing ingestion outcome, schema validation results, and requested follow-ups. Place report in exchange/reports/inbox/order-2025-10-14-011-report.json.
